CMStyleValidator Class Reference

This is used in conjuction with CMStyle to validate CSS styles. More...

Inheritance diagram for CMStyleValidator:

Data Fields

 $fontFamily = array('inherit', '@font', '@fontlist')
 Specifies the font name of a box. This can be a comma-separated list, of which the browser will use the first font it recognizes. Font names that are made up of more than one word must be placed within quotation marks.
 $fontSize
 Specifies the size of a font in a box.
 $zIndex = array('inherit', 'auto', '@int')
 Specifies the order of relative or absolutely positioned boxes in the z-axis. The higher the number, the higher that box will be in the stack.

Detailed Description

This is used in conjuction with CMStyle to validate CSS styles.

All possible validation rules are;

  1. @font
  2. @fontlist
  3. @percent
  4. @length
  5. @int
Author:
Elliot Chance

Specifies the size of a font in a box.
